markdownRemark.html:
最近突然在各种 timeline 上看到 speculative sampling 这个半年前的论文，冥冥之中感觉自己也应该好好学习一下。其实这个方法很简单，大致就是：

  1. 对于 prompt x1,...,xnx_1, ..., x_nx1​,...,xn​，先用 draft 模型（小模型）去 autoregressive 地生成 x~n+1,...,x~n+K\tilde x_{n+1}, ..., \tilde x_{n+K}x~n+1​,...,x~n+K​，顺便得到 Pdraft(X∣x1,...,xn,x~n+1,...,x~n+i−1)\textbf{P}_{\text{draft}}(X|x_1,...,x_n,\tilde x_{n+1},...,\tilde x_{n+i-1})Pdraft​(X∣x1​,...,xn​,x~n+1​,...,x~n+i−1​)，(1≤i≤K)(1 \le i \le K)(1≤i≤K)；
  2. 然后把 x1,...,xn,x~n+1,...x~n+Kx_1,...,x_n,\tilde x_{n+1},...\tilde x_{n+K}x1​,...,xn​,x~n+1​,...x~n+K​ 作为 target model（大模型）的输入，一次性得到 Ptarget(X∣x1,...,xn,x~n+1,...,x~n+i−1)\textbf{P}_{\text{target}}(X|x_1,...,x_n,\tilde x_{n+1},...,\tilde x_{n+i-1})Ptarget​(X∣x1​,...,xn​,x~n+1​,...,x~n+i−1​)，(1≤i≤K)(1 \le i \le K)(1≤i≤K)；

  3. for t in range(1, K+1)

    • 随机生成 r∼U[0,1]r\sim U[0,1]r∼U[0,1]，如果 r<min(1,Ptarget(x~n+t∣x1,...x~n+t−1)/Pdraft(x~n+t∣x1,...x~n+t−1))r < \text{min}(1, \textbf{P}_{\text{target}}(\tilde x_{n+t}|x_1,...\tilde x_{n+t-1})/\textbf{P}_{\text{draft}}(\tilde x_{n+t}|x_1,...\tilde x_{n+t-1}))r<min(1,Ptarget​(x~n+t​∣x1​,...x~n+t−1​)/Pdraft​(x~n+t​∣x1​,...x~n+t−1​))，那么 n+tn+tn+t 位置就用 x~n+t\tilde x_{n+t}x~n+t​，
    • 不然，认为 draft 模型和 target 模型偏差有些大了，就退出循环，并用之前得到的结果来随机出 xn+tx_{n+t}xn+t​：

    xn+t∼(Ptarget(X∣x1,...,x~n+t−1)−Pdraft(X∣x1,...,x~n+t−1))+x_{n+t}\sim(\textbf{P}_{\text{target}}(X|x_1,...,\tilde x_{n+t-1})-\textbf{P}_{\text{draft}}(X|x_1,...,\tilde x_{n+t-1}))_+xn+t​∼(Ptarget​(X∣x1​,...,x~n+t−1​)−Pdraft​(X∣x1​,...,x~n+t−1​))+​

这个方法的一个重点在于，他是精确解，不是近似解。简单推一下公式，有：

P(target 选 xi)=∑jP(target 选 xi∣draft 选 xj)P(draft 选 xj)=P(target 选 xi∣draft 选 xi)P(draft 选 xi)+∑j≠iP(target 选 xi∣draft 选 xj)P(draft 选 xj)=PD(xi)×min⁡(1,PT(xi)PD(xi))+∑jPD(xj)(1−min⁡(1,PT(xj)PD(xj)))max⁡(0,PT(xi)−PD(xi))∑kmax⁡(0,PT(xk)−PD(xk))=min⁡(PD(xi),PT(xi))+max⁡(0,PT(xi)−PD(xi))∑j(PD(xj)−min⁡(PD(xj),PT(xj)))∑kmax⁡(0,PT(xk)−PD(xk))=min⁡(PD(xi),PT(xi))+max⁡(0,PT(xi)−PD(xi))=PT(xi)=Ptarget(xi∣x1,...xi−1)\begin{aligned} \textbf{P}(\text{target 选 }x_i) =& \sum_j{\textbf{P}(\text{target 选 }x_i|\text{draft 选 }x_j)\textbf{P}(\text{draft 选 }x_j)}\\ =&\textbf{P}(\text{target 选 }x_i|\text{draft 选 }x_i)\textbf{P}(\text{draft 选 }x_i)\\ &+ \sum_{j\ne i}{\textbf{P}(\text{target 选 }x_i|\text{draft 选 }x_j)\textbf{P}(\text{draft 选 }x_j)}\\ =&\textbf{P}_\text{D}(x_i)\times\min(1,\frac{\textbf{P}_\text{T}(x_i)}{\textbf{P}_\text{D}(x_i)}) +\\ &\sum_j\textbf{P}_\text{D}(x_j)(1-\min(1,\frac{\textbf{P}_\text{T}(x_j)}{\textbf{P}_\text{D}(x_j)}))\frac{\max(0, \textbf{P}_\text{T}(x_i)-\textbf{P}_{\text{D}}(x_i))}{\sum_k\max(0, \textbf{P}_\text{T}(x_k)-\textbf{P}_{\text{D}}(x_k))}\\ =&\min(\textbf{P}_\text{D}(x_i), \textbf{P}_\text{T}(x_i))+\\ &\max(0, \textbf{P}_\text{T}(x_i)-\textbf{P}_{\text{D}}(x_i))\frac{\sum_j(\textbf{P}_{\text{D}}(x_j)-\min(\textbf{P}_{\text{D}}(x_j), \textbf{P}_\text{T}(x_j)))}{\sum_k\max(0, \textbf{P}_\text{T}(x_k)-\textbf{P}_{\text{D}}(x_k))}\\ =&\min(\textbf{P}_\text{D}(x_i), \textbf{P}_\text{T}(x_i))+\max(0, \textbf{P}_\text{T}(x_i)-\textbf{P}_{\text{D}}(x_i))\\ =&\textbf{P}_\text{T}(x_i)=\textbf{P}_\text{target}(x_i|x_1,...x_{i-1}) \end{aligned}P(target 选 xi​)======​j∑​P(target 选 xi​∣draft 选 xj​)P(draft 选 xj​)P(target 选 xi​∣draft 选 xi​)P(draft 选 xi​)+j​=i∑​P(target 选 xi​∣draft 选 xj​)P(draft 选 xj​)PD​(xi​)×min(1,PD​(xi​)PT​(xi​)​)+j∑​PD​(xj​)(1−min(1,PD​(xj​)PT​(xj​)​))∑k​max(0,PT​(xk​)−PD​(xk​))max(0,PT​(xi​)−PD​(xi​))​min(PD​(xi​),PT​(xi​))+max(0,PT​(xi​)−PD​(xi​))∑k​max(0,PT​(xk​)−PD​(xk​))∑j​(PD​(xj​)−min(PD​(xj​),PT​(xj​)))​min(PD​(xi​),PT​(xi​))+max(0,PT​(xi​)−PD​(xi​))PT​(xi​)=Ptarget​(xi​∣x1​,...xi−1​)​

frontmatter.title: 极简 speculative sampling 介绍
